column5: For those looking.... Apparently they are paying quite well. Apply by this Sunday as they need to fill the positions by Monday.  http://www.adventis.ca/job-details.php?ref=2040  http://www.adventis.ca/job-details.php?ref=2037
Shoot, they look good but I'm not qualified. Thanks for the heads up though.
Any ideas which site is being decommissioned ?
Its in chalk river from what I understand.
OPG looking for a 3rd party name to replace theirs in the newspaper...that facility has been plaqued with problems
